body_html: I believe you don't have to create so large buffer, perhaps buffer=10000 is enough. The cost is new dataset samples from every 10000 images, instead of total images. However it should be accepted in practice, at least for me.

body: I believe you don't have to create so large buffer, perhaps buffer=10000 is enough. The cost is new dataset samples from every 10000 images, instead of total images. However it should be accepted in practice, at least for me.
